name: The Devil's Hotel(Beta)
description:
The Devil's Hotel(Beta) is a first person horror game created by a solo developer. The game starts in a hotel that is dark and haunted. You have to find key and code to get out of one lobby of the hotel.

Minimum System Requirement : GTX 950, AMD Ryzen 3 or intel i5, 4gb RAM       Required System Requirement : GTX 1650, AMD Ryzen 5 or intel i7, 8gb RAM

Average Gameplay Time: 10 - 15 minutes

Note :

The game heavily contains Jumpscares If you have heart disease, please avoid playing this game.

Major Fixes v1.0.1 :

> Audio in the menu too loud

> Footstep sound

> Flashlight position

> Loading Screen

Features
  • Immersive Graphics and lighting that is made with Unreal Engine 5 with new technology like Lumen and Virtual Shadow Map. And Metahuman for Ghost Character.
  • A dark atmosphere.
  • Impressive Gameplay.
For the best experience wearing headphones is recommended. To remove Warning Text press ` key and then write command DisableAllScreenMessages and press Enter keyMove: W,A,S,D Interaction: E Torch ON / OFF: Left Mouse Button If you played the game, please consider rating the game If you liked the game and want to support the development of this project and upcoming projects, do consider donating via this site. I appreciate all the supporters.The game is under development or in early stage the full game will be released within two months.
